column4: My previous Ubuntu installs have all been dual boot, and there was automagically a listing in the boot loader for memtest86. This time, it's th eonly OS on here, and never loads a boot loader menu for me to choose from. How do I then access memtest86?
one option would be to just run memtest86 from a cd: http://www.memtest86.com/download.html
Normally, that's what I'd have done, but I opted for an extra battery in this laptop, instead of CDROM
